meanings.definition: A device used to hold two or more objects together.
meanings.sent1: The fasteners on my backpack kept all my books secure.
meanings.sent2: She used fasteners to attach the papers to the bulletin board.
meanings.sent3: The fasteners decided to have a race to see who could hold things together the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His love was the fasteners that kept her heart from falling apart.
meanings.sent5: The fasteners clicked into place like puzzle pieces, creating a strong bond.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that fastens.
meanings.sent1: The skilled fasteners at the tailor shop quickly fixed my torn shirt.
meanings.sent2: The fasteners in the workshop were always busy connecting different parts.
meanings.sent3: The fasteners at the party were the ones who made sure everyone's outfits stayed put.
meanings.sent4: She was the fasteners in our group, always bringing us together in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The fasteners in the storybook magically brought the characters closer with each turn of the page.
